channel.title: How do you make a server?
channel.description:
someone please answer me! and preferrably step by step on what to click on stuff :confused:[br][size=1]Posted at: August 06, 2006, 03:45:02 PM[/size][hr]also, when i try to run "runMoparScape MS-DOS Batch File 1KB" after i extracted all files, it goes to:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: java/lang/StringBuild er at Bot.<clinit><Bot.java:103> Press any key to continue...
help?

item.title: How do you make a server?

item.description:
@Gato_Loco wrote:

there is a forum for this buddy, why dont you go hunt for it?

Read full topic
